summary.description:
Identification and dynamic quantification of regulatory elements using total RNA.

Homer Software and Data Download.

Software for motif discovery and next-gen sequencing analysis.

Check out the csRNA-seq paper in Genome Research: https://genome.cshlp.org/content/early/2019/10/24/gr.253492.119.abstract.

Sequencing the 5' end of cap-protected RNAs enables the identification of Transcription Start Sites (TSS) at nucleotide resolution
summary.name: csRNA-seq
